title: Fury as Three's mobile network collapses
text:
Major telecoms provider Three has suffered a network outage that could have affected up to 10 million customers in the UK.

The mobile phone network faced up to 9,000 complaints from customers across the UK this morning, who have been affected by an outage first reported on Wednesday evening.

A spokesperson for Three said: “Three is currently experiencing technical difficulties with our services across voice, text and data which means that some customers will be experiencing an intermittent service.

"Our engineers are working on the issue now to fix the problem as soon as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused to our customers.”

The company has not yet clarified what caused the outage...
description: Major telecoms provider Three has suffered a network outage that could have affected up to 10 million customers in the UK.
